action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Arms Export Control Act to increase the threshold triggering certain notification requirements with respect to licenses for the exportation of firearms.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Firearms Congressional Notification Modernization Act.
Section 36 of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2776) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by inserting (or, in the case of a defense article that is a firearm controlled under category I of the United States Munitions List, $4,000,000 or more) after $1,000,000 or more each place it appears; and
in subsection (c), by striking $1,000,000 and inserting $4,000,000.
